languages.text: {n}Сестра Арджента приветствует вас с горящими глазами.{/n} "С возвращением, Вольный Торговец! Испытания не смогли сломить волю избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора и помешать {mf|ему|ей} вернуться к тем, кто уповал на {mf|него|нее}!"

{n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сестра Арджента приветствует вас с горящими глазами.{/n} "С возвращением, Вольный Торговец! Испытания не смогли сломить волю избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора и помешать {mf|ему|ей} вернуться к тем, кто уповал на {mf|него|нее}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

{n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

{n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

{n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

{n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔向你致意，双眼中闪烁着熊熊烈焰。{/n}“欢迎回来，行商浪人！没有任何试炼能够战胜帝皇神选者的意志！也没有任何苦难能阻止他们回到期许之人的身旁！”
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔向你致意，双眼中闪烁着熊熊烈焰。{/n}“欢迎回来，行商浪人！没有任何试炼能够战胜帝皇神选者的意志！也没有任何苦难能阻止他们回到期许之人的身旁！”

languages.text: {n}Schwester Argenta grüßt dich mit brennenden Augen.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Keine Prüfung konnte den Willen {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Imperators brechen oder {mf|ihn|sie} daran hindern, zu jenen zurückzukehren, die all ihre Hoffnung in {mf|ihn|sie} setzen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Schwester Argenta grüßt dich mit brennenden Augen.{/n} "Willkommen zurück, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Keine Prüfung konnte den Willen {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Imperators brechen oder {mf|ihn|sie} daran hindern, zu jenen zurückzukehren, die all ihre Hoffnung in {mf|ihn|sie} setzen!"

languages.text: {n}Sœur Argenta vous salue avec un regard fervent.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Nulle épreuve ne saurait briser la volonté de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur ou l'empêcher de retourner auprès de ceux qui ont placé tous leurs espoirs en {mf|lui|elle} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sœur Argenta vous salue avec un regard fervent.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous revoir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Nulle épreuve ne saurait briser la volonté de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur ou l'empêcher de retourner auprès de ceux qui ont placé tous leurs espoirs en {mf|lui|elle} ! »

languages.text: {n}La hermana Argenta te saluda con ojos ardientes.{/n} «¡Sea bienvenid{mf|o|a} una vez más, Comerciante Independiente! ¡No hay prueba capaz de quebrantar la voluntad de los elegidos del Emperador ni de impedir que vuelvan a quienes depositan en ellos su confianza!».
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La hermana Argenta te saluda con ojos ardientes.{/n} «¡Sea bienvenid{mf|o|a} una vez más, Comerciante Independiente! ¡No hay prueba capaz de quebrantar la voluntad de los elegidos del Emperador ni de impedir que vuelvan a quienes depositan en ellos su confianza!».

languages.text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタが燃えるような眼差しで出迎える。{/n}「おかえり、自由開拓者！どんな試練も、皇帝にチョーズンの意志を断ち切ることはできないし、陛下が希望を託した人々のもとに戻るのを止めることもできない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}シスター・アルジェンタが燃えるような眼差しで出迎える。{/n}「おかえり、自由開拓者！どんな試練も、皇帝にチョーズンの意志を断ち切ることはできないし、陛下が希望を託した人々のもとに戻るのを止めることもできない！」

languages.text: {n}Rahibe Argenta, coşkulu gözlerle seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Hoş geldin Hür Tacir! Hiçbir imtihan, kendisine güvenenlerin İmparator'un seçilmişine kavuşmasını önleyemez! Seçilmişin iradesi asla kırılmaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sister Argenta greets you with burning eyes.{/n} "Welcome back, Rogue Trader! No trial could break the will of the Emperor's chosen or stop {mf|him|her} from returning to those who have put their hopes in {mf|him|her}!"
